post.title: Controller Asset
post.description: If you want something simple to use as a video game controller this asset has you covered!
post.content:
If you want something simple to use as a video game controller this asset has you covered!

picnic members can message for different color edits I won‚Äôt be adding designs though sorry

Controller asset will be on my kofi. Picnic Members can request color change link will be down below #vtuberasset pic.twitter.com/sswzxVGOmZ

— HoneyKub üß∏ COMMS OPEN ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è (@Honey_Kub) August 7, 2022
